Register for CampUs

{{First_Name}}
{{Last_Name}}
{{Username}}
{{Email}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; interface ISignupComponent { First_Name: string Last_Name: string Email: string Password: string Username: string } @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.css'] }) export class SignupComponent { // type: string = "password"; public First_Name = '' public Last_Name = '' public Email = '' public Password = '' public Username = '' public SignupComponents: ISignupComponent[] = [ { First_Name: 'joe', Last_Name: 'johnson', Email: 'qwsd', Password: '123', Username: '321' } ] // isText: boolean = false; // eyeIcon: string= "fa fa-eye"; // hideShowPass(){ // this.isText = !this.isText; // this.isText ? this.eyeIcon = "fa-eye-slash" : this.eyeIcon = "fa-eye"; // this.isText ? this.type = "text" : this.type = "password"; // } async addUser(){ this.SignupComponents.push({ First_Name: this.First_Name, Last_Name: this.Last_Name, Email: this.Email, Password: this.Password, Username: this.Username }) this.First_Name = '' this.Last_Name = '' this.Email = '' this.Password = '' this.Username = '' } }
